Module hanyaeger.api
Package com.github.hanyaeger.api.engine.entities.entity.collisions

Interface AABBCollided

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Bounded, DimensionsProvider, NodeProvider
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    AABBSideAwareCollided
    public interface AABBCollided
extends Bounded
    A AABBCollided represents an non-rotatable YaegerEntity that can be collided with by a Collider. In such a case, the AABBCollided is the YaegerEntity that gets notified of the collision.

    There are different types of collision detection. In the case of an AABBCollided we perform so called Axis-Aligned Bounding Box collision detection, which required the instances of YaegerEntity to not be Rotatable.

    Each Game world Update a AABBCollided is checked against all instances ofCollider. If many instances of Collider are part of the YaegerScene, this could lead to many calculations, which could slow down the game and framerate. Thus ensure only those instances of YaegerEntity that really need to be part of the collision detection implement the AABBCollided or Collider interfaces.

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default void checkForCollisions​(Set<Collider> colliders)
      Perform collision detection with a Set of Collider instances.
      void onCollision​(Collider collidingObject)

    • Method Detail

      • onCollision

        void onCollision​(Collider collidingObject)
        This method is called if a collision has occurred.
        Parameters:
        collidingObject - The EntityCollection you are colliding with.

      • checkForCollisions

        default void checkForCollisions​(Set<Collider> colliders)
        Perform collision detection with a Set of Collider instances. Only the first collision is detected.
        Parameters:
        colliders - A Set of colliders that should be checked for collisions.
